text: Archery is an mandatory sport at the Universiade that has been contested as optional sport between 2003 and 2015, and after 2017 became a compulsory sport. Unlike the Olympic competition, both recurve and compound disciplines are competed. == Events == === Recurve === {| class="wikitable" |- !
